discourse_list.title: Ban Accounts Whinging/Crying About Missing the Airdrop

content.content: Hi, I propose to move the motion that going forward any accounts that make forum posts or post comments under other forum posts purely aimed at how they “Missed the airdrop”, “want the airdrop date changed” or any other notion relating to the Airdrop to be banned with immediate effect. These users are not helping the project or holders of UNI who’s primary focus is now towards governance and helping Uniswap move forward instead these users are hijacking this forum purely for the money aspect not providing any value to the platform or its users. Would be great to see the forum be brought back to its glory with discussion about genuine proposals and not garbage towards how one has missed an opportunity
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes to ban accounts that post comments about missing the airdrop or wanting the airdrop date changed. The author believes that these users are not contributing to the platform or its users and are only focused on making money. The proposal aims to bring the forum back to its original purpose of discussing genuine proposals. The post may receive constructive criticism and questions from third parties.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Hi Uniguy, We’re keeping our eyes on it. And, we’ve already removed a lot of unneccesary posts. However, we also believe discussion should be possible. And, so a few threads are still up in which this whole discussion can take place. That being said, I’m locking this thread.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
